info.name: ServerSearch
info.description: Adds a button to search your servers. Search in place or in popout. Support Server: bit.ly/ZeresServer

options.name: Popout
options.desc: Shows a popout with a list of guilds to search.

options.name: In Place
options.desc: Hides guilds in the list that don't match the search.

changelog.title: Bugs Squashed
items: Menu closes when you leave it.
